  <input class="mzp-c-choice-control" type="" name="Choice"
   id="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.choice" value="">
  <label class="mzp-c-choice-label "
   for="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.choice">Label</label>

</div>

List 

<div class="mzp-c-field">
  <label class="mzp-c-field-label"
   for="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.list">Label</label>
  <input class="mzp-c-field-contol"
   list="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.list-options"
   name="list" id="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.list">
  <datalist
   id="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.list-options">
    <option value="Option 1">
    <option value="Option 2">
    <option value="Option 3">
  </datalist>

</div>

Select 

<div class="mzp-c-field">
  <label class="mzp-c-field-label"
   for="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.select">Label</label>
  <select class="mzp-c-field-control" name="select"
   id="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.select">
    <option>Option 1</option>
    <option>Option 2</option>
    <option>Option 3</option>
  </select>

</div>

Textarea 

<div class="mzp-c-field">
  <label class="mzp-c-field-label">Label</label>
  <textarea class="mzp-c-field-control" name="textarea"
   id="patterns.molecules.forms.fields.textarea"></textarea>

</div>
